title: Water Detection
description: Use capacitive sensing data to build a model to detect water presence and finger touches
long_description: This project allows you to build a model for detecting water presence and finger presses on surfaces using the capacitive sensing technology of Infineon CAPSENSE™. This model is suitable for applications like water/rain detector for safety of electronic devices or equipments, touch button/control for use in wet environments, etc.
